snippet: This show centers on a detective who takes her brother’s children into her own family after he goes to prison.
abstract: Neil Genzlinger reviews television series Ties That Bind, premiering on UP network.
lead_paragraph: This show centers on a detective who takes her brother’s children into her own family after he goes to prison.

headline.print_headline: She’s the Cop, Her Brother Is the Jailed Bad Guy, and His Kids Need a Home
